events.title: Festival of Lanterns
events.description: Annual celebration in the town square. Lanterns are lit at dusk and floated down the river to honor ancestors.

adventureLog.title: Secrets of the Shrine
adventureLog.summary: The party returned to the ancient shrine ruins to investigate further. They deciphered ancient inscriptions that revealed the location of a hidden entrance to underground caverns.
highlights: Deciphered the ancient runes using the Map Fragment
Helped the spirit of a lost child return home
Uncovered the entrance to the underground caverns

adventureLog.title: The Journey Begins
adventureLog.summary: Our heroes met in the village of Windwhisper and accepted a quest to investigate strange occurrences in the nearby forest. Elder Kaito spoke of shadows that moved against the wind and strange sounds echoing from ancient ruins.
highlights: Met the mysterious Elder Kaito who spoke in riddles
Discovered ancient ruins hidden in the Whispering Woods
Fought off a pack of shadow wolves
Found a strange map fragment with symbols
